data.name: The Pointless Car Chase
data.detailed_description:
The epic original that'll leave you scratching your head and saying, "what?". The first game of R.E.M. Studios - jump into the past, and relive the real-est car chase simulator the internet has to offer.


Original Description:
The Pointless Car Chase, the game you have been waiting for!

You are a wanted criminal stranded on an abandoned stunt island and the only way to survive is to drive, fast. Dodge the never ending horde of police cars and speed towards ramps in your attempt to stay alive.



Note: This is a historical item — the first game by R.E.M. Studios. For this reason, it will not be updated, so it can be preserved in all of its perfection.
data.about_the_game:
The epic original that'll leave you scratching your head and saying, "what?". The first game of R.E.M. Studios - jump into the past, and relive the real-est car chase simulator the internet has to offer.

data.short_description: How you got here... no idea; Why you're being chased... no idea; Drive fast, and escape the police cars that will stop at nothing to bring you down, and inevitably lead to the decline of your sanity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 530
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Xeon® CPU E3-1225 v3 @ 3.20GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
